content1: We need to send an SMS from your phone to verify and register your mobile number on nxtduka.
sub_heading1: Please select the SIM registered with your bank & ensure your mobile data is enabled
sub_heading2: By selecting a SIM, I agree to the Terms and Conditions. Regular carrier charges may apply.

dialog_box_2.heading: Verify Mobile Number
dialog_box_2.fail_content: Note: Mobile network not available. You may try again or try later.
